module.caption: AT45DBX DataFlash Example
module.info: Provide an application example using the Atmel DataFlash AT45DBx component. The DataFlash requires an SPI bus as a low level communication interface. This interface can be implemented using SPI or USART in SPI mode for AVR devices.
